content: offering an instant pdf crochet pattern to make a gorgeous and easy baby afghan the beautiful tulip stitch forms it s own scalloped border as you work such a fun make > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern approximate finished size will be 28 x 28 the pattern will be available for you to download in pdf format directly after your payment is received materials needed worsted weight yarn crochet hook size h8/5mm tapestry needle pattern is written in english using standard american terms pattern is written in english using standard american terms level advanced beginner copyright ©2020 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/tulip-stitch-at-twilight-a-crochet-baby-afghan/
